page.title: 20SHEPPERTON STUDIOS
page.content: The first studios were built in Littleton,near the embankment of The Queen Mary reservoir in 1935.They were built on the site of an old mansion house dating back from about 1100. These studios became known as Shepperton Studios and the buildings gradually expanded then decreased as did the popularity of the feature film industry. Many firms associated with the film world now occupy the site_these range from electricians to carpenters,from model makers to lighting engineers. The average cost for making a feature film in 1985 is 15 million dollars. Usually the producers chose one of 2 ways to spend the most of this money_ they either use very realistic scenery or costumes,the second way is to employ a famous actor or actress.
